revised_title: Obituary of Sir Thomas Little Heath
tldr: The obituary of Sir Thomas Little Heath, a distinguished scholar and public servant, who made significant contributions to mathematics and classics. He achieved three Firsts in his studies at Trinity College, Cambridge, and had a successful career in the civil service, eventually becoming the Comptroller General of the National Debt Office. He also wrote a history of Greek mathematics and a book about the Treasury.
